page.title: 15RELIGION IN HATFIELD
page.content: Christ Church serves the Parish of Dunscroft and it is in the diocese of Sheffeild.The vicar of the church often comes to our school because we are a church school.Christ Church was built in 1965 and is unusual because it has eight sides.The church is used for Brownies and Guides,social events ,Youth clubs and private parties as well as its ordinary role as a place of Worship.There are between 6500 and 7000 in this Parish but only between 35 and 40 people are regular church goers.The church is open 7 days a week.Its main use on a Saturday is for Weddings.On a Sunday there are Christenings and Funerals and of course Sunday Worship.The church has a council elected annually from the people who attend regularly.
